 From Version 6.0.0-preview.2.21154.6 -> To Version 6.0.0-preview.6.21308.1

Work around dotnet/sdk#18148

Referencing differing versions of System.Text.Json confused the SDK, so consistently push it to a higher version for Bootstrap with the thing that drags it up (DependencyModel)
